title: Auto-commit after each successful iteration
description:
Ticker should commit changes after each successful iteration to preserve incremental progress. This ensures that if a later iteration times out or fails, the previous work isn't lost.

Implementation:
- After iteration completes successfully (no error)
- Run git add -A && git commit with iteration info in message
- Only if there are actual changes to commit
- Include task ID and iteration number in commit message
- Skip if no changes detected (git status clean)
